annotations.highlight: “Good decisions come from experience, and experience often comes from bad decisions.”
Understanding Game, for lack of a better term, and how and why it functions, is literally a survival skill.
education takes effort.
Siddhartha lernte Neues auf jedem Schritt seines Weges, denn die Welt war verwandelt, und sein Herz war bezaubert.
Schön war die Welt, wenn man sie so betrachtete, so ohne Suchen, so einfach, so kinderhaft.

“Es mag wohl so sein”, sagte Siddhartha müde. “Ich bin wie du. Auch du liebst nicht—wie könntest du sonst die Liebe als eine Kunst betreiben? Die Menschen von unserer Art können vielleicht nicht lieben. Die Kindermenschen können es; das ist ihr Geheimnis.”
Die Welt hatte ihn eingefangen, die Lust, die Begehrlichkeit, die Trägheit, und zuletzt auch noch jenes Laster, das er als das törichteste stets am meisten verachtet und gehöhnt hatte: die Habgier.

Siddhartha verlor die Gelassenheit bei Verlusten, er verlor die Geduld gegen säumige Zahler, verlor die Gutmütigkeit gegen Bettler, verlor die Lust am Verschenken und Wegleihen des Geldes an Bittende.
In diesem sinnlosen Kreislauf lief er sich müde, lief er sich alt, lief sich krank.

title: Die Welt als Wille und Vorstellung. Band I (German Edition)
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

annotations.highlight: »Die Welt ist meine Vorstellung:«
There is no ONE. This is the soul-mate myth. There are some good Ones and some bad Ones, but there is no ONE.
In my estimation ONEitis is an unhealthy psychological dependency that is the direct result of the continuous socialization of the soul-mate myth in our collective consciousness.

People subscribing to the myth would rather build a soulmate, consequences be damned. So, women will attempt to Build a better Beta, or tame down an Alpha, while men will attempt to turn a whore into a housewife, or vice versa.
In any relationship, the person with the most power is the one who needs the other the least.

There’s nothing wrong with backing down from an argument you have with your girlfriend, but there is something wrong when you continually compromise yourself in order to ‘keep the peace’ with the understanding that she’ll withhold intimacy as a result of you holding your ground. That is a power play, also known as a ‘shit test’.
Self-estimation (not self-esteem) never happens spontaneously, there always has to be some crisis to prompt it. Anxiety, trauma and crisis are necessary catalysts to stimulate self-consciousness.

Here’s a cosmic secret revealed for you: Real Power is the degree to which a person has control over their own circumstances. Real Power is the degree to which we actually control the directions of our lives.
So entrapped are we in our self-expectation and self-imposed limitations that we fail to see that we have always had the keys to our own prisons – we’re just scared shitless to use them.
Half of the battle is knowing you want to be with a woman who wants to please you, not one who feels obligated to.
Real desire is created by her thinking it’s something she wants, not something she has to do.
Learn this now: Women never want full disclosure. Nothing is more self-satisfying for a woman than to think she’s figured a Man out based solely on her mythical feminine intuition (i.e. imagination).

Familiarity is anti-seductive. Nothing kills Game, organic passion and libido like comfortable familiarity. Despite their common filibuster tactics, women don’t want to be comfortable with a potential (or proven) sex partner, they need their imaginations stoked to be excited, aroused and anxious to want sex with a potential partner.
You can break her frame with cockiness and the imaginings that come with it. Breaking from an established, predictable familiarity is often a great way to fire her imagination.
start changing your patterns, get into shape, make more money, get a promotion, improve and demonstrate your higher value in some appreciable way and the imagination and competition anxiety returns.

The two greatest difficulties for women to overcome in their own methodology is that they are only at a sexually viable peak for a short window of time (generally their early 20s) and the fact that the qualities that make a good long term partner (the Good Dad) and the qualities that make for good breeding stock (Good Genes) only rarely manifest themselves in the same male.
Short term schedules facilitate breeding with the Good Genes male, while long term breeding is reserved the Good Dad male.

experience teaches harsh, but it teaches best. Rejection, real, raw, in your face rejection stings like a bitch. It must be something so intolerable that human beings will devise countless social and psychological constructs in order to avoid it. However, there is no better teacher than getting burned by the stove. As a Man, you are going to face rejection in far more facets of your life than just dealing with a woman.
Frame is everything. Always be aware of the subconscious balance of whose frame in which you are operating. Always control the Frame, but resist giving the impression that you are.
the balance of frame often shifts. Frame is fluid and will find its own level when a deficit or a surplus of will is applied to change it.
a woman is attracted to you does not mean she’s ready to ‘enter your reality’. Her entering your frame may become a byproduct of that attraction, but it by no means guarantees it.
In order to establish a healthy male-frame, the first step is to rid themselves of the preconception that women control frame by default. They don’t, and honestly, they don’t want to.

When a woman intentionally makes you wait for sex you are not her highest priority. Sexuality is spontaneous chemical reaction between two parties, not a process of negotiation. It’s sex first, then relationship, not the other way around. A woman who wants to fuck you will find a way to fuck you.

women who want to fuck will find a way to fuck. The girl who tells you she needs to be comfortable and wants a relationship first is the same girl who fucked the hot guy in the foam cannon party in Cancun on spring break just half an hour after meeting him.
with just average Game, in 3 dates you should be able to determine if her desire level is high enough to want to fuck you.

If you have sex on the 1st date or a same-night-lay, in all likelihood she’s really hot for, and into, fucking you based on physical criteria alone. If you have sex on the 2nd or 3rd date, she’s into fucking you and probably wants a relationship, but she wanted to give you a token impression of her not being ‘easy’.
If she fucks you after the 4th date, you’ll do as her first alternate. If you’re sexless after 5-6 dates you’ve probably been at it for over 6 weeks and The Medium is the Message. NEXT.
As I outlined in Plate Theory, you don’t have to be banging every girl on your roster, but those women should want to be banging you.
Mothers want to be Mothers. Men are only Fathers when a woman decides this for him even in the happiest of marriages.
Women are fundamentally incapable of loving a man in the way that a man expects to be loved by a woman.
Men believe that love matters for the sake of it. Women love opportunistically.
Women are utterly incapable of loving a man in the way that a man expects to be loved.

Women are incapable of loving men in a way that a man idealizes is possible, in a way he thinks she should be capable of. In the same respect that women cannot appreciate the sacrifices men are expected to make in order to facilitate their imperatives, women can’t actualize how a man would have himself loved by her.

Our girlfriends, our wives, daughters and even our mothers are all incapable of this idealized love. As nice as it would be to relax, trust and be vulnerable, upfront, rational and open, the great abyss is still the lack of any capacity for women to love Men as Men would like them to.
men can’t tell when a woman doesn’t love them, because they want to believe women can love them in the ways they think they could.

Is loneliness a disease that necessitates a cure? If men could be made to believe so, think of the potential profit to be made from, and the potential for manipulation of, men. The real test for a man is how he lives with himself, alone.
Good girls are just bad girls who never got caught.
Looks. Assets. Game. Have two. Three is best, but if you only have one, Game is the most essential.

title: Framers: Human Advantage in an Age of Technology and Turmoil
author: Kenneth Cukier, Viktor Mayer-Schönberger, and Francis de Véricourt

annotations.highlight: Um allein zu leben, muß man ein Thier oder ein Gott sein – sagt Aristoteles. Fehlt der dritte Fall: man muß Beides sein – Philosoph...
Aus der Kriegsschule des Lebens. – Was mich nicht umbringt, macht mich stärker.
Hilf dir selber: dann hilft dir noch Jedermann. Princip der Nächstenliebe.
Kann ein Esel tragisch sein? – Daß man unter einer Last zu Grunde geht, die man weder tragen, noch abwerfen kann? ... Der Fall des Philosophen.
Hat man sein warum? des Lebens, so verträgt man sich fast mit jedem wie? – Der Mensch strebt nicht nach Glück; nur der Engländer thut das.
Was? du suchst? du möchtest dich verzehnfachen, verhundertfachen? du suchst Anhänger?–Suche Nullen!
Unter Frauen. – »Die Wahrheit? Oh Sie kennen die Wahrheit nicht! Ist sie nicht ein Attentat auf alle unsre pudeurs?« –
Du läufst voran? – Thust du das als Hirt? oder als Ausnahme? Ein dritter Fall wäre der Entlaufene ... Erste Gewissensfrage.
Bist du echt? oder nur ein Schauspieler? Ein Vertreter? oder das Vertretene selbst? – Zuletzt bist du gar bloß ein nachgemachter Schauspieler ... Zweite Gewissensfrage.

title: Alpha Male Strategies: Dating Techniques In The Social Media Age
author: Alpha Male  Strategies

annotations.highlight: women hate men who are too available.

When you call women consistently for dates they have the assurance that you'll call for a date so there’s no need to pursue you. You have to take that comfort away. you need to become a little more erratic in your behavior.
You got to always let a woman feel as if she's more interested in you than you are in her. Once a woman feels you're more into her than she is into you her attraction could drop drastically.

When you have no fear of going out by yourself, spending a Friday or Saturday night home alone or at a bar by yourself, you my friend can handle any woman's confidence test or commonly known as shit test.
when you have a purpose you're never really alone.

A high-value male is simply a man who is primarily focused on his passion and purpose in life. He lives a life of social abundance and moves to the beat of his own drum. He doesn’t have time to chase women, he’s too busy pursuing his goals and dreams. He pursues a woman in the beginning but if he gets any resistance he has an abundance mindset and simply moves on.
The only way women will respect your time is if they know they can’t have you anytime they get ready.
She can either flake on you or flake for you, the choice is yours.
Uncertainty is a woman's kryptonite. Uncertainty is the opposite of validation. Once you give a woman certainty the mystery and challenge are over and she starts to look for her next prey.
money goes, looks fade, status fades but charisma is there to stay.
the hard way a quiet more mysterious approach was best.
since you’re not blabbing your mouth telling her your life story. Women like discovering you slowly over time. So you should let a woman do most of the talking by asking HER questions.

How will you know if you haven't even tried? Try a variety of things. When it comes to monetizing your purpose you need to find someone who’s already successful in doing what you're trying to do and copy their business model.
pick the passion that offers you the most financial freedom.
stay on their purpose Monday through Friday and to socialize on the weekend.
Nothing drops a woman's attraction faster than a man seeking a woman's approval.
I'm totally against a direct approach except on vacation or something like that.
If you're a true high-value man you should have a standard you expect all women to follow.
Every woman I date either obeys my commandments or I dismiss them.
Always remain in a calm assertive tone when dealing with women.
The best way to keep a woman's interest is to never let her know your interest level.
Men must understand that the testing with women never ends.
Nothing kills attraction worse than a man who loses confidence.
It’s always better when the woman thinks she likes you more than you like her.
if you haven't slept with her by the end of the third date stop taking her out.
The only exception I would make to this rule is if she's offering to pay for a date.
Keep your phone and text conversations to a minimum.
she's not sleeping with you best believe she's sleeping with someone.
In reality a man could have many more options if he'd focus more on his purpose and less on women.
Women have no respect for a man who’s willing to be her friend in hopes of one day getting a chance to get in her pants.
The first step to becoming a high-value man is to develop low tolerance for women’s crap.
It’s easy to make a woman submit once she's begged you back because now she sees you don't do idle threats.
Showing up late for dates, flaking on dates last minute are both examples of a woman not respecting your time.
If a woman flakes on a date with you make sure the next couple of dates are at your house.
If she shows up late for a date, make sure you check her and she buys the first round. You have to let women know you're a busy man and you don't wait on people.
A woman can never love you if she doesn't respect you.
I advocate keeping your time and financial investment very low. Women can be very fickle. One minute they're all over you, the next moment they're not returning your calls.
Giving women validation only makes them take you for granted.
Always keep the initial dates as cheap as possible.
Keep your non-sexual attention to a minimum.
Women get bored easily because they can get sex anytime they feel like it so a man who’s not a challenge is boring to them.
an abundance mindset and the ability to enjoy being alone.
These insecurities usually lead the beta male to ruining their relationship.
Being bitchy is a female’s version of masculinity.
The best way to become more masculine is to hang around more masculine men.
We are what we hang around guys.
That sense of entitlement is going to turn the woman on.
Complimenting women is a sign of lower status.
If you treat her like a celebrity she's going to treat you like a fan.
Women have very low self-esteem for the most part.

I simply mean I wait for IOI, or indicators of interest. These IOI's can be subtle so you must be observant. some of these IOI's include a woman staring at you, coming and standing near you and making conversation about nothing.
Doing activities you love to do puts you in a position to meet women without looking for them.
Men have to understand you have to go through a lot of no's to get to the yes's.
Materialistic women, relationship women, attention whores and alpha seekers.
Women seeking relationships tend to be the most difficult to sleep with.
She just enjoys the free attention.
You simply ask her out and when she gives you her lame excuse you simply reply back with "hit me up when you have available time to hang out."
a man to be focused on his purpose and to let life come to him.
I'm the king of my reality and to pursue women who haven't displayed interest is just not my style.
attraction is not a choice. She's either attracted to you or she's not.
Now the approach I prefer is to go up to a woman and introduce myself. I then ask the woman her name and would she like to get a drink sometime.
a cold approach for a woman who’s in a hurry like the mall, supermarket etc. so I'm trying to get to the point quickly.
when you're cold approaching women you need to understand that they are observing your body language and voice pitch during your approach.
High value men don't have time to pursue women with low interest.
Women with low interest will not send out signals; unfortunately, attention whores will.

There are two types of attention whores. There's the kind that just wants your validation by flirting with you but will reject you when you make a formal approach and the other type is the one that will give you her number and try to use you for your non-sexual attention by talking on the phone.
If a woman wants my attention it comes with a price and that price is sex in the future.

Men who have options don't tolerate women's crap. Men with options don't call the next day, they're too busy conquering the world. Men with options have other women they're already dating. Men with options can't just fit a woman on their schedule on a whim.
availability is an attraction killer to women.

Ask her what’s her availability this week? Don't ask her if she's available Saturday or anything like that because if she's busy Saturday you run the risk of looking too available when she counters with another day.
If she's unsure of her schedule, let her check her schedule and get back to you. Do not, I repeat, do not call or text her back to check to see if she's checked her schedule.
you've set the date tell her you'll think of someplace nice, but you won't tell her where. Tell her it's a surprise.
So the proper way to confirm a date is on the day of the date send the woman the location, time and ask her does that work for her?
If women see that other women find you attractive their attraction level will more than likely raise.
High-value men don't have a fear of loss and therefore are not concerned with upsetting women.
Confident women respect your time and let you focus on your purpose. Insecure women need to get a text or call from you every hour on the hour.
nice things don't make you immune to shit test. In fact, nothing makes you immune to shit test.
Asking a woman out for drinks screams fuckboy aka alpha Male.
At the end of the date always ask her back to your place.
The only time you should go for a kiss on the first date is if when you invite her to your place and she accepts.

If she's displaying a high interest level, why would she want to date a guy who doesn't have the same interest level or at least close to her interest level? So if she's displaying high interest it's ok to pursue her a little more.
Whoever is paying is leading the interaction.
most women don't want to lead.
Men should always be in the leadership position.
Remember you can't make yourself too unavailable because that’s a turn off to women with high interest because you're not displaying their same high interest.
You should never be the one asking for more of her time.
If she never contacts you again, you simply move on.
If she declines your invite end the call abruptly and tell her to keep in touch. Even if she calls you again you don't ask her out.
The last situation of over pursuing is when a woman flakes on a date with you and doesn't try to reschedule.
Men with options don't over pursue. They have too many options to chase behind women.
wait 7-10 days.
You want a woman who gets wet at the mere sight of you, not a woman you got to beg to give you a kiss.
A woman's personality should be the reason you get in a relationship, not sex.
Women can only do what you let them do.
Women can tell if you're dating other women by how you carry yourself.
Let your accomplishments speak for themselves.
Just look calm and keep the conversation flowing.
Always let women do a majority of the talking on dates.
Patience is the key to closing the deal with women.
You both are sitting down on the couch and so it’s time to make your move. First ask her to move in closer to you. You don't move in closer to her because that’s submissive.
A woman needs to be in her feminine energy to submit to a man sexually, so it’s imperative to keep a woman in her feminine.
Always go back to first base which is her neck.
it’s much easier making them climax if they have an emotional attachment to you.
You accomplish this emotional attachment by being focused on your purpose and letting her chase your validation, maintaining a masculine frame and having her submit to you.
if she pulls back, you pull back. Never pursue her more than she pursues you.
Going forward if you're a red pilled man you should expect every woman you date to walk out of your life at some point.
The reason I prefer men to meet women in public is because we as men can attract women with more than just physical appearance.
I typically would meet up with a high or low interest prospect around 6 or 7 pm. Have a drink or two and then meet up with the woman I'm sleeping with.
If you don't have any women you're sleeping with then date the low interest prospects before you go on a date with a high interest prospect.
Let’s be honest, there's going to be a large portion of women you sleep with that you never want to see again.
As a man you're supposed to feel there's no way another man has the ability to take your woman.
The longer you know a woman the more attached you're going to be and the harder it's going to be to pass these tests. That’s why staying on your purpose is key to passing these tests.
When you let her get on top you're letting her find her own spot.
Under no circumstances are you to perform oral sex. It’s too submissive and validating.
Things you'll see when your woman pulls back are less intimacy; she'll spend less time with you, she won't initiate contact as much if at all and she'll seem colder and distant.
The only way to counter a woman's pullback is to pull back yourself. That'll raise her interest because absence makes the heart grow fonder.

Don't look at the pullback as a bad thing, look at it as a warning sign. A warning sign that should be taken seriously if you want to keep your woman. Look at it as an opportunity to regain focus on your purpose and regain control of your relationship.
Hier genoss er seines Geistes und seiner Einsamkeit und wurde dessen zehn Jahr nicht müde.
Siehe! Ich bin meiner Weisheit überdrüssig, wie die Biene, die des Honigs zu viel gesammelt hat, ich bedarf der Hände, die sich ausstrecken.
Verwandelt ist Zarathustra, zum Kind ward Zarathustra, ein Erwachter ist Zarathustra: was willst du nun bei den Schlafenden?
ich gebe kein Almosen. Dazu bin ich nicht arm genug."
Ich lehre euch den Übermenschen. Der Mensch ist Etwas, das überwunden werden soll. Was habt ihr gethan, ihn zu überwinden?
Was ist der Affe für den Menschen? Ein Gelächter oder eine schmerzliche Scham. Und ebendas soll der Mensch für den Übermenschen sein: ein Gelächter oder eine schmerzliche Scham.
Der Übermensch ist der Sinn der Erde. Euer Wille sage: der Übermensch sei der Sinn der Erde!

Wahrlich, ein schmutziger Strom ist der Mensch. Man muss schon ein Meer sein, um einen schmutzigen Strom aufnehmen zu können, ohne unrein zu werden. Seht, ich lehre euch den Übermenschen: der ist diess Meer, in ihm kann eure grosse Verachtung untergehn.

Der Mensch ist ein Seil, geknüpft zwischen Thier und Übermensch, - ein Seil über einem Abgrunde.
Der Mensch ist ein Seil, geknüpft zwischen Thier und Übermensch, - ein Seil über einem Abgrunde.

title: Never Split the Difference: Negotiating As If Your Life Depended On It
author: Chris Voss and Tahl Raz

annotations.highlight: Fisher and Ury’s approach was basically to systematize problem solving so that negotiating parties could reach a mutually beneficial deal—the getting to “Yes” in the title. Their core assumption was that the emotional brain—that animalistic, unreliable, and irrational beast—could be overcome through a more rational, joint problem-solving mindset.
